    • Constructor Detail

      • Dragon

        public Dragon(java.lang.String name,
              int life,
              int degats)
        Spawns a dreadful dragon and determines its stats.
        Parameters:
        name - the type of dragon, including an adjective describing it.
        life - the number of hit points of the dragon.
        degats - the number of damage the dragon causes when it attacks.
